message.body: Hola! Do you think 3 years is a long time to be engaged?
I just think it depends on the couple and their life circumstances.
Because I think that's what's going to happen to me
You want to make sure you do it right And that you're both in a good place. With work, school, finances etc.
I think 28 is a great age to get married.
Yeah that's what I figured too. I would want a wedding I want vs. a wedding that's severely cut back because of finances.
Enjoy your engagement for a while and take time off about thinking about wedding details. Just enjoy each other. You got the man. He's not going anywhere :)
Yeah....would you ever transfer to a nursing school so that you could live with Mike?

I thought about it, but I wanted the 3 year masters. Georgetown and GW don't have that. Plus at jefferson I'd be taking courses towards my masters in the first 2 years so it'd be dumb to just up and leave.
This is my last week at work. We should get together next week!
Do you think we can do the following week? Next week I have a lab quizzes and my chem final is that freaking Saturday at 8:00 am! What about May 3rd (Sunday) or the 4th (monday).
Ok. Yeah. Maybe Monday. I'm off that week too.
